whoAmI.title: Who Am I?
whoAmI.content: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in Magento 2 development. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I specialize in creating robust e-commerce solutions.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.content:
Specialized in Magento 2 and Adobe Commerce Cloud, I provide comprehensive solutions for B2B and B2C e-commerce projects.

My technical expertise includes front-end and back-end development, performance optimization, security, and third-party system integration.

I also offer consulting services in technical architecture and digital strategy.
